DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate whether cervical cancer screen completion among under-screened woman could improve offer HPV ( human papillomavirus ) test at-home self-collection follow screen invitation compare screening invitation alone .
DOC.brief_title: Effect HPV Self-Collection Cervical Cancer Screening High Risk Women : My Body , My Test 3
DOC.detailed_description: Invasive cervical cancer ( ICC ) preventable regular screening treatment , one fifth US woman report receive Pap test recommended interval . More half ICC case occur under-screened woman . For woman 30 year old , US Preventive Services Task Force recommend Pap smear alone every 3 year physician-collected HPV test Pap smear ( co-testing ) every 5 year . The FDA approve primary HPV physician screen US woman 25 year old . Self-collection HPV test valid well-accepted method detect HPV infection comparable sensitivity specificity physician-collection detect high-grade cervical lesion . This 2-arm randomized control trial 510 woman investigate whether offer HPV test mail at-home self-collection under-screened woman increase likelihood complete cervical cancer screening . All participant receive screen invitation phone : phone call providing ( ) education cervical cancer , ( ii ) assistance schedule appointment free screen study-affiliated clinic , need . Those randomize intervention arm first mail kit self-collect cervico-vaginal sample , return sample oncogenic HPV testing , receive result phone . HPV negative woman consider screen complete . HPV positive woman invite schedule appointment free follow-up in-clinic screen call result deliver . The study endpoint screen completion define complete in-clinic screening ( control arm participant HPV positive intervention arm participant ) receive negative HPV self-collection result ( intervention arm ) . Aim 1 . Determine whether at-home HPV self-collection increase completion cervical cancer screen among under-screened woman offer enhanced reminder . Aim 2 . Examine possible mechanism explain intervention 's effect , lack effect . Aim 3 . Estimate incremental cost per additional woman complete screen add at-home HPV self-collection enhance reminder .
DOC.criteria: Female Aged 25 64 year old Living â‰¤250 % federal poverty line Completion cervical Pap screen precede 4 year Completion HPV test precede 5 year Pregnant History hysterectomy Unable provide inform consent
